title: Progressive Smart Slicer
description:
Slice, julienne, shred and grate tomatoes, cucumbers, potatoes, apples and more with one easy tool. This all-encompassing design has no loose blades and includes a pop-up grater integrated into the mandoline. Four thickness settings allow you to change the size of your slices.

The featured product can be purchased at: http://www.surlatable.com/product/PRO-184749/Progressive-Smart-Slicer
